breakingbad.quote: If you believe that there’s a hell, we’re pretty much already going there.
breakingbad.author: Walter White

breakingbad.quote: I'm not in the meth business. I'm in the empire business.
breakingbad.author: Walter White

breakingbad.quote: The Universe is Random. Not Inevitable. It's simple Chaos.
breakingbad.author: Walter White

breakingbad.quote: Fifty years I spent like that. Finding myself awake at three in the morning. But you know what? Ever since my diagnosis, I sleep just fine.
breakingbad.author: Walter White

breakingbad.quote: Don't drink and drive but if you do, call me.
breakingbad.author: Saul Goodman
